===Origins===

====12th century====
As early as the [[12th century]], the '''Yoruba people''' of the [[Niger River]] [[Niger River Valley|valley]] (in modern-day [[Nigeria]]) started worshiping the [[Vodū]] gods (as did the [[Fon]] people of [[Dahomey]] (in modern-day [[Benin]]). The '''Yorubans''' knew the Vodū [[Sky Father]] [[Buluku (Earth-616)|Buluku]] as "Olorun".<!-- {{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1|; The [[Vodū]]'s entry}} -->

Buluku's offspring [[Lusa (Earth-616)|Lusa]] and [[Mahu (Earth-616)|Mahu]], and their family, became directly involved in mortal affairs, and descended to the ancient city of [[Ife]],{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1|; The [[Vodū]]'s entry}} which they founded,{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1|; [[Shango (Vodū) (Earth-616)|Shango]]'s entry}} the legendary first city of the Yoruba people (in modern-day [[Osun State]]). One of the several interdimensional nexuses between [[Earth]] and [[Orun]], the dimension of the Vodū, is located near Ife.{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1|; The [[Vodū]]'s entry}}<!-- 

===[[Modern Age]]===
... -->

==Culture==
===Religion===
The Yorubans worshipped the [[Vodū|Vodū, or Orishas]]:<!-- {{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1|; The [[Vodū]]'s entry}} -->
* The [[Sky Father]] [[Buluku (Earth-616)|Buluku]] was known as "Olorun".{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1|; The [[Vodū]]'s entry}}
* [[Sagbata (Earth-616)|Sagbata]] was known as "Sonponno".{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1|; [[Sagbata (Earth-616)|Sagbata]]'s entry}}
* In [[Earth-1218|our reality]], [[Kokou]], one of [[Gods of Wakanda (Earth-616)|Gods of Wakanda]],{{r|Black Panther Vol 6 13}} is gof of war from [[Benin]].{{r|[[Wikipedia:Kokou (orisha)|Kokou at Wikipedia]]}}

===Language===
The Yoruba language is a major language in [[Wakanda]] (along with [[Wakandan Dictionary|Wakandan]] and [[Hausa]]).{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Wakanda]]'s entry}}

The name of the African gods, the "[[Orisha]]",{{r|[[Wikipedia:Orisha|Orisha at Wikipedia]]}} is from the Yoruba language, The Orishas is the name by which the [[Gods of Wakanda (Earth-616)|Gods of Wakanda]] are known.{{r|Black Panther Vol 6 13}}
